	<item>
		<title>Workshop Offerings</title>
		<link>http://pyromancy.org/2012/08/workshop-offerings/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 15 Aug 2012 15:20:56 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[gbtunney]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.pyromancy.org/?p=1237</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[We have created a variety of object manipulation workshops which were presented at different festivals and retreats. These are available to host at your event! Please <a href="http://www.pyromancy.org/contact/">contact</a> us to arrange workshops in your area. New workshops can be added and presented material can be customized to meet the specific needs of the event.

<strong><a href="http://wildfireretreat.com/">Wildfire Retreat August 2012 
</a>Three Section Staff Workshop at Wildfire Retreat (8-20-12 @12:10pm) Instructor: <a href="http://www.pyromancy.org/about/performers/doktor-potter-dee/">Potter Dee</a></strong>

Description: The Three Section Staff (San Jie Gun), is a stunning mix of staff, poi, nunchucks, whip, clubs, and it's own interesting geometries, the 3-section is really just the coolest. One of the classic weapons of China, the the san-jie-gun is as flexible on the stage as it is on the battlefield. We will cover a bit of history, construction, and a number of basic and intermediate moves. With a few months of practice, you will have a one bad ass piece of equipment to add to your routine. This is a weapon and it has a steep learning curve. Long pants, sleeves, shoes, hat, are suggested. You will get bruised and knocked around a bit during this class. I will try to bring a few extras, but it would be best for people to bring their own 3-sections. Email me for info on making/buying a good/cheap one.

Prerequisites: An understanding of how to handle a staff is necessary and some poi background would be helpful. A basic 3-section can be built from oak dowels, eye screws, and quicklinks. Make sure the middle section is wider then your shoulders.

<strong><a href="http://brushwood.com/sirius.html">Workshops offered at Sirius Rising 2012 at Brushwood Folklore Center</a>:
</strong>

<strong><em>Off - Body Hoop Dance *</em></strong> Instructor: <a href="http://www.pyromancy.org/about/performers/gillian-tunney/">Gillian Tunney</a>

"Off - Body" hooping is when the hoop is no longer around the core of your body, instead its up over your head, being passed around your body, or hooping with your hands and arms in the vertical plane. We will be covering a lot of the basic off body moves like hand hooping in different planes, weaves, the helicopter, flips, jump ins, jump outs, we can even get into some isolations, body rolls, elbow hooping, and most importantly, we will learn how to put it all together. I can tailor this class to the level of the students and if someone has something specific they want me to go over, let me know! Bring a hoop that is smaller and more lightweight. We will have hoops for people to use.

<strong><em>Hoop Making / Hoop Dance Skill Share </em></strong>  ( craft, movement ) Instructor: <a href="http://www.pyromancy.org/about/performers/gillian-tunney/">Gillian Tunney</a>

Come learn how to make and decorate a hoop. We will have different types of tubing, and gaffer,duck tape, colored gaffer tape, fabric scraps,ribbons and fancy sparkly tape( for additional fee ). You are welcome to bring your own decorative materials to experiment with. Afterwards we will have an open hoop jam / skill share and i can provide tips and instruction based on student requests. If you are not interested in making a hoop, but would like to learn or share please bring your own and participate in the open jam. Materials fee varies based on the materials used: Practice hoops range from $8-12 and hoops using sparkly tapes $20-30

<strong><em>Intro to Staff Manipulation * </em></strong>Instructor: <a href="http://www.pyromancy.org/about/performers/gillian-tunney/">Gillian Tunney</a>

We'll cover all of the basics of Staff / baton, both concepts and tricks to give you a foundation so you can begin a wonderfully rewarding life full of spinning a stick and feeling totally awesome. If you've never spun a staff before or already have some experience, this class will prepare you with demonstration and discussion of planes, transitions, and beats as we cover figure-eights (2 beats), around-the-world, 2-hand spins ( rotors ) , tosses, and some introductory contact moves like elbow and neck rolls. Please bring a staff of any size if you have one and limited number of extras will provided.

<strong><em>Fire Dancing Safety</em></strong> Instructor: <a href="http://www.pyromancy.org/about/performers/doktor-potter-dee/">Potter Dee</a>

From first time fire dancers to seasoned veterans, everyone could use a refresher course in fire safety to keep you on top of your game. We will cover regulations, fuels, first aid, and techniques to keep fire spinning safe.  Attendance is mandatory for anyone wanting to fire dance at Sirius and identifying bracelets will be distributed to attendees.

<strong><em>Rope Dart</em></strong> Instructor: <a href="http://www.pyromancy.org/about/performers/doktor-potter-dee/">Potter Dee</a>

So you want to spin fire but don’t have the coordination for poi?  Want to be able to defend yourself from unruly robber mobs?  Look like a bad-ass ninja at a moment’s notice?  Want to take your poi to the next level and involve your lower body?  Well have we got a class for you!  Rope-dart is pretty much a heavy thing on the end of a rope you swing about to keep away enemies, but with exploration, it becomes a tool of dance and beauty.  We will cover what scraps of history there are, construction of various types, and then instruction in the basic use of the dart and some theory to expand it into dance.  No loose clothing like sarongs and skirts. Pants and shoes prefered.  

* note: parts of this workshop description were sourced from Wildfire website

]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[open]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[open]]></wp:ping_status>

	</item>
	<item>
		<title>Party for the Parks 2012 - Intergalactic Blast</title>
		<link>http://pyromancy.org/2012/09/party-for-the-parks-2012-intergalactic-blast/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 05 Sep 2012 23:24:56 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[gbtunney]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.pyromancy.org/?p=1240</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<a href="http://www.pyromancy.org/wp-content/uploads/2012/08/622567_446743895357600_2130183829_o.jpg"><img src="http://www.pyromancy.org/wp-content/uploads/2012/08/622567_446743895357600_2130183829_o-621x1024.jpg" alt="" title="622567_446743895357600_2130183829_o" width="621" height="1024" class="alignnone size-large wp-image-1241" /></a>

Join us Friday, September 7 for an Intergalactic Blast in Delaware Park.  We’ll haveintergalactic cocktails, moon-mission munchies and plenty of aliens, robots and Martian go-go dancers!  Wear your finest sci-fashions and visit our space-age makeup stand for an alien makeover.  You’ll have close encounters with great auctions, live bands, DJs, and amazing light shows.

Celebrate the Olmsted Parks with Lawley Insurance & WBEN Radio!

6:30 p.m. – 11: 00 p.m.

$20.00 advanced tickets and member cost

$25.00 at the door

$75 an all-inclusive food and drink ticket

<u><strong>Additional Links:</strong></u>
- <a href="https://www.facebook.com/pages/Olmsteds-Party-for-the-Parks/141859915846001">Facebook Event Page</a>
- Ticket Info here: <a href="http://www.bfloparks.org/">http://www.bfloparks.org/</a>

[iframe src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/7iXY_DnQNE4" width="560" height="315"]

<strong><u>Check out the promo video above!</u></strong><br/>
Greetings Earthlings! Prepare yourself for a close encounter of the partying kind. Whether you're a hard core trekkie, a casual watcher of late-night, B-rated science fiction movies, or just someone who likes having a good time, Party for the Parks promises to be an Intergalactic Blast to celebrate our 10th Annual Party for the Parks, the Marcy Casino in Delaware Park will be transformed into Buffalo's very own Area 51, replete with Martian go-go dancers, heavenly music, UFO-inspired light shows, and so much more to explore.

Get in the spirit by dressing as your favorite space alien. Don't have a costume? Not to worry... there will be a team of makeup artists on site to help complete your extraterrestrial look. Join 1,000 or so of the parks' closest friends on September 7, 2012 for a party that will be out of this world.]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>1240</wp:post_id>

	<item>
		<title>Steampunk Festival 2012 at Leonard Oakes Estate Winery - 9/01/2012</title>
		<link>http://pyromancy.org/2012/08/steampunk-festival-2012-at-leonard-oakes-estate-winery-9012012/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 29 Aug 2012 15:17:45 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[gbtunney]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.pyromancy.org/?p=1270</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<a href="http://www.pyromancy.org/wp-content/uploads/2012/08/Steampunk-Festival.png"><img src="http://www.pyromancy.org/wp-content/uploads/2012/08/Steampunk-Festival.png" alt="Steampunk Festival" title="Steampunk Festival" width="600" height="841" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-1274" /></a>

We are performing at the Steampunk Festival at <a href="http://www.oakeswinery.com/">Leonard Oakes Estate Winery</a> on September 1st, 2012. More information is located on the <a href="https://www.facebook.com/events/404219626301857/">facebook event page</a>. 

<u><strong>Entertainment Lineup:</strong></u>
5PM- Black Powder Cannon Start!
5PM-8PM- SteamPunk Nerf Dueling (come with a group and the winner gets a prize)
5PM-9PM- Vendors & Vendor Demonstrations
6PM-10PM- Food Truck Lane (R & R BBQ, Roaming Buffalo and Pete’s Treats)
7PM-7:30PM- Beard & Mustache Competition (Awards for best Beard, mustache and Fake mustache)
7:30PM-8:15PM- Three Heads Brewing Tasting ($10 fee)
7PM-8PM- Armageddon Party
8:15PM-9PM- Fire show by Pyromancy
9:15-10PM- The Science of Ca’Dio performance
10PM-11PM- Pine Fever
*SteamPunk slideshow & movies throughout event at the SteamPunkTheatre!

*A 2012 SteamPunk Festival Grand Award will be given to the Best SteamPunk Costume throughout the evening!

 <a href="http://www.pyromancy.org/wp-content/uploads/2012/08/210368_10150986396995723_1579416973_o.jpg"><img src="http://www.pyromancy.org/wp-content/uploads/2012/08/210368_10150986396995723_1579416973_o-223x300.jpg" alt="" title="210368_10150986396995723_1579416973_o" width="223" height="300" class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1276" /></a>

Related links:
- <a href="http://www.oakeswinery.com/">Leonard Oakes Estate Winery</a>
- <a href="https://www.facebook.com/pages/Leonard-Oakes-Estate-Winery/185306415722">Leonard Oakes Estate Winery on facebook</a>]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>LED Performance Demo Reel 2013</title>
		<link>http://pyromancy.org/2012/12/led-performance-demo-reel-2013/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 28 Dec 2012 20:58:00 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[gbtunney]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.pyromancy.org/?p=1376</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[youtube]ZxAN8HKudgU[/youtube]

We are available for booking at indoor events! Types of performances can include acts for large and small sized stages, interactive and roaming acts. A variety of props include LED hoops,poi,wands,staff and silk flags, fans, streamers, stilts, juggling.

<u><strong>Video credits: </strong></u>
<strong>Videography:</strong> <a href="http://www.candlelight-productions.com/">Red Rob</a>, <a href="http://www.candlelight-productions.com/">Maia Alexandra</a>, <a href="https://www.facebook.com/seth.black2">Seth Tyler-Black</a>
<strong>Video Editing:</strong> <a href="http://www.pyromancy.org/about/performers/gillian-tunney/">Gillian Tunney</a> , <a href="http://www.candlelight-productions.com">Red Rob</a> (intro sequence)
<strong>Photos:</strong> <a href="https://www.facebook.com/carl.cederman.3">Carl Cederman</a>, <a href="http://www.facebook.com/bigpunn316">Jose Vega</a>, <a href="http://www.buffalorising.com/">Buffalo Rising</a>, <a href="buffalo.com">Buffalo.com</a>
<strong>Locations:</strong> Party for the Parks 2011, Dance Your Art Off, Alt Theatre, Sunset Bay Beach Club
<strong>Music:</strong> STS9 - The Spectacle (Ott Remix)
]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Video preview from &quot;The Rave&quot; in Buffalo Boys</title>
		<link>http://pyromancy.org/2013/03/video-preview-from-the-rave-in-buffalo-boys/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 08 Mar 2013 17:52:11 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[gbtunney]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.pyromancy.org/?p=1403</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<a href="http://www.pyromancy.org/wp-content/uploads/2013/03/photo-main.jpg"><img src="http://www.pyromancy.org/wp-content/uploads/2013/03/photo-main.jpg" alt="Buffalo Boys" width="640" height="480" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-1408" /></a>
BUFFALO BOYS by Raymond Charles is a feature film about IAN, a 15 year-old entangled in a plot to murder a 67 year-old woman. It was filmed in Buffalo NY, and they are currently raising money on <a href="http://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1995880137/buffalo-boys-movie">Kickstarter</a>. There is 9 more days to go! Pyromancy appeared in the footage from the rave scene on stage. Please help support this film!

<strong><u>Buffalo Boys - The Rave</u></strong>
[youtube]A59uXDSt08c[/youtube]

<strong><u>Related Links</u></strong>
- <a href="https://www.facebook.com/BuffaloBoys">Buffalo Boys Facebook</a>
- <a href="http://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1995880137/buffalo-boys-movie">Buffalo Boys Kickstarter</a>
- <a href="http://www.buffalorising.com/2013/02/buffalo-boys.html">Article in Buffalo Rising</a>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>2013 Balle Business Conference</title>
		<link>http://pyromancy.org/2013/06/2013-balle-business-conference/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 11 Jun 2013 19:39:32 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[gbtunney]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://http://localhost/PYROMANCY2016/wordpress/?p=1423</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Pyromancy will be performing at the Balle Conference Happy Hour Friday, June 14th, 2013 @ 5:30 PM - 9:00 PM at Larkin Square ( <a href="https://maps.google.com/maps?q=Larkin+Square+-+Exchange+St+and+Larkin+Street+14210&amp;hl=en&amp;ll=42.881247,-78.87394&amp;spn=0.073586,0.110378&amp;sll=42.87848,-78.872738&amp;sspn=0.073589,0.110378&amp;hq=Larkin+Square+-+Exchange+St+and+Larkin+Street+14210&amp;radius=15000&amp;t=m&amp;z=13&amp;iwloc=A" target="_blank">map</a> )

<div align="center"><a href="http://localhost/PYROMANCY2016/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2013/06/BALLE2013PosterLR.jpg"><img class="size-full wp-image-1424 aligncenter" alt="BALLE2013PosterLR" src="http://localhost/PYROMANCY2016/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2013/06/BALLE2013PosterLR.jpg" width="434" height="674" /></a></div>

( <i><a href="http://www.buffalofirst.org/balle2013" target="_blank">From Buffalo First</a></i> ) Calling all Localists! Once per year our community assembles for a can’t-miss gathering that is a who’s who of innovators collaborating to build a new economy. From international thought leaders and on-the-ground social entrepreneurs, to policymakers, network builders, local economy funders, philanthropists, and everyone in between, Localists of all stripes will be descending on Buffalo, New York June 12-14, 2013 to share the work of building a new economy.

Our conference is an immersive experience that will put you at the center of passionate action and innovative solutions, and give you the fuel you need to amplify your work at home. Standing in line for lunch you’re likely to meet someone running a start-up kitchen and food hub, a person of significant wealth who is combining philanthropy and investment dollars to build local living economies in a particular place, an entrepreneur who has created a network of businesses to localize apparel manufacturing, a bank president who is building a triple bottom line approach to strengthening their particular economy, a farmer and organizer who is building food security in the food desert of Detroit, and a systems thinker who is weaving the frame within which we flourish.

<span style="text-decoration: underline;"><b>Related links:</b></span>
-Balle : <a href="http://bealocalist.org/">http://bealocalist.org/</a>]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[open]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[open]]></wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name><![CDATA[2013-balle-business-conference]]></wp:post_name>
		<wp:status><![CDATA[publish]]></wp:status>

	</item>
	<item>
		<title>August 17th 2013: City of Night !</title>
		<link>http://pyromancy.org/2013/08/city-of-night-pheonix-from-the-ashes/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 14 Aug 2013 20:27:10 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Potter Dee]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://http://localhost/PYROMANCY2016/wordpress/?p=1435</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[The second annual City of Night will transform what has been dubbed Silo City from an iconic reminder of our local history into a dreamy spectacle of light, art and performance.

<u><strong>PYROMANCY PERFORMANCES:</strong></u>

We will be performing:
9:40-10pm at the Light Garden with NeWT from Armageddon Party providing live EBM
11:40-12:10 <strong>"Phoenix From the Ashes"</strong> a two level extravaganza with live music by Fuego and the Beaters! <em>location</em>: Mezzanine Walkway behind the main stage. 

<a href="http://localhost/PYROMANCY2016/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2013/08/city.png"><img src="http://localhost/PYROMANCY2016/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2013/08/city.png" alt="city" width="481" height="264" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-1441" /></a>

Admission is free to all. Check Facebook for updates about installations, music, food and new additions to the event. https://www.facebook.com/CityOfNightBuffalo

The evening will include:
- Artist installations in/outside the grain elevators
- 464 Gallery Art Fair, a marketplace showcasing local artists and craftspeople
- A main music stage, lineup to be announced soon!
- Interactive art and performance for guests to experience
- Food trucks!!!
- A beer/wine tent
- GO Bike guided bike trips to the venue (5, 7 and 9pm) and a bike valet to check your two-wheeled ride
- Queen City Ferry drop off at the event, new this year

Inspired by Western New York’s rich industrial history, City of Night celebrates what was and what is, giving visitors a unique opportunity to interact up close with the massive grain elevators on Buffalo’s waterfront while simultaneously embracing the culture and energy of new Buffalo.

Projections from 2012:
[youtube]EfGsb6vm7io[/youtube]

Related Links:

- <a href="http://cityofnightbuffalo.com">City of Night Buffalo</a>
- <a href="https://www.facebook.com/CityOfNightBuffalo">City of Night Facebook</a>
- <a href="https://www.facebook.com/events/1374337876122212/">Facebook Event Page</a>
]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>The Witches Ball: A Masquerade - October 31, 2013</title>
		<link>http://pyromancy.org/2013/10/the-witches-ball-a-masquerade-october-31-2013/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 30 Oct 2013 19:00:39 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[gbtunney]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://http://localhost/PYROMANCY2016/wordpress/?p=1485</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<a href="http://localhost/PYROMANCY2016/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2013/10/Witches-Ball-John-Buffalo-NY.jpg"><img src="http://localhost/PYROMANCY2016/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2013/10/Witches-Ball-John-Buffalo-NY-680x1024.jpg" alt="Witches-Ball-John-Buffalo-NY" width="575" height="866" class="alignnone size-large wp-image-1486" /></a>

<strong>The Witches Ball</strong> | Hotel at The Lafayette | 391 Washington St., Buffalo, New York 14203 | Thursday, October 31, 2013 | 8:00pm until 1:00am – <a href="https://www.facebook.com/events/204868649687348/">See Facebook</a> | Lighting effects by Joel Resnikoff

A glam to ghoul Halloween party in Downtown Buffalo NY – 21 and over.

Tix are $25 presale and $30 at the door (upon availability) – <a href="http://tinyurl.com/witchesball2013">purchase a ticket</a>.

<i>( <a href="http://buffalorising.com/2013/10/the-witches-ball-a-masquerade-october-31-2013/">Excerpt from Buffalo Rising</a> )</i> For the second year, I’m happy to announce that The Witches Ball will be played out at The Hotel @ The Lafayette. Riding on the success of its inaugural outing as a macabre masquerade, this year we are turning up the heat by offering more live music, more dance acts, and more mayhem in general (while keeping in mind that the event is hosted inside an elaborately restored historic hotel in the heart of Downtown Buffalo).

Besides being a masquerade, where partygoers will fit right in by just wearing a suit or a dress, along with a mask, there will also be cash prizes for best overall costume, sexiest guy/girl, and best steampunk getup. We’re adding a second banquet room for the steampunkers too. Called Cirque du Steam (presented by <a href="http://jphii.com/">JPHii Design</a>)…

<strong>CIRQUE du STEAM <a href="http://jphii.com/">PRESENTED BY JPHii DESIGN</a> </strong>

8:00 Armageddon Party 
8:30 Difecta 
9:00 Rose Witch Release 
9:30 The Savage Buffalo Snake Oil Show 
10:00 Avius Me 
10:30 Armageddon Party
11:00 The Savage Buffalo Snake Oil Show 
<strong>11:30 Pyromancy ( Special LED Performance )</strong>
12:00 The Savage Buffalo Snake Oil Show

<a href="https://www.facebook.com/events/204868649687348/">Facebook Event Page</a>]]></content:encoded>

	</item>
	<item>
		<title>Le Cirque de la Lune - March 15th, 2014</title>
		<link>http://pyromancy.org/2014/03/3-11-2014-le-cirque-de-la-lune/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 11 Mar 2014 19:12:42 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[gbtunney]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://http://localhost/PYROMANCY2016/wordpress/?p=1625</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[3.11.2014 

<a href="http://localhost/PYROMANCY2016/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2014/03/CIRQUE-Lune-Buffalo-NY-1-resize.png"><img src="http://localhost/PYROMANCY2016/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2014/03/CIRQUE-Lune-Buffalo-NY-1-resize.png" alt="CIRQUE-Lune-Buffalo-NY-1-resize" width="550" height="711" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-1633" /></a>

Le Cirque de la Lune | Ukrainian Center DNIPRO | 562 Genesee St, Buffalo, NY 14204 (<a href="https://www.google.com/maps/place/562+Genesee+St/@42.89585,-78.855574,17z/">map</a>) | Saturday, March 15, 2014 | 8:00pm until 12:00am – See <a href="https://www.facebook.com/events/507051479415974/">Facebook</a> 

<strong>Emerging Arts Group that produces “CITY of NIGHT” at Silo City presents Multidisciplinary Art Circus: le Cirque de la Lune at the Dnipro Ukrainian Cultural Center.</strong>

BUFFALO- Saturday March 15th, 2014 at 8pm, <a href="http://www.elabuffalo.com/">ELAB</a> presents le Cirque de la Lune, an art circus on the night of the full moon, featuring talented local dancers, acrobats, and performance artists. Organized by Emerging Leaders in the Arts Buffalo (ELAB). Circus goers will enjoy two dance floors, open photo booths, participatory art installations, live sketching, a freak show, and fortune tellers in circus tents lining the ballroom. Featuring local bands, jesters, aerialists, acrobats, fire dancers, burlesque dancing and drag performances.

Tickets are $10/advance, $15/door.  Interested parties are encouraged to buy tickets at the link below. Cotton candy and popcorn will be available, as well as a cash bar. Funds will support both the ELAB Library of artist materials and City of Night.

Related Links:
- <a href="http://www.elabuffalo.com/upcoming-events.html">Ticket Information</a>
- <a href="http://www.elabuffalo.com">ELAB</a>
- <a href="https://www.facebook.com/events/507051479415974/">Facebook Event</a>]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

	</item>
	<item>
		<title>Mirror Mirror – June 20th, 2014</title>
		<link>http://pyromancy.org/2014/06/mirror-mirror-june-20th-2014/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 17 Jun 2014 20:56:29 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[gbtunney]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://http://localhost/PYROMANCY2016/wordpress/?p=1653</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<div align='left'><a href="http://localhost/PYROMANCY2016/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/10386918_10152113210954071_3997897570719930603_o.jpg"><img src="http://localhost/PYROMANCY2016/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/10386918_10152113210954071_3997897570719930603_o-500x195.jpg" alt="10386918_10152113210954071_3997897570719930603_o" width="500" height="195" class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1654" /></a></div>

<em>Special Event</em>
<a href="http://www.albrightknox.org/programs-and-events/event:06-20-2014-7-00pm-mirror-mirror/">Mirror | Mirror</a>
<em>A Massive Summer Celebration at the Albright Knox</em>

Friday, June 20, 2014, 7–11 pm
<div style="float:left;margin-right:15px;margin-bottom:5px;"><a href="http://localhost/PYROMANCY2016/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/www.albrightknox.org_.jpg"><img src="http://localhost/PYROMANCY2016/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/www.albrightknox.org_-150x150.jpg" alt="www.albrightknox.org" width="150" height="150" class="alignnone size-thumbnail wp-image-1655" /></a></div>
Come celebrate as our beloved Mirrored Room returns to the Albright-Knox Art Gallery and our community. It’s seven years of bad luck if you don’t attend! 

INSIDE: Lucas Samaras’s Room No. 2 and Other Treasures from Our Collection
The doors to the magical room will open and memories will flood back as you experience the Mirrored Room and other treasures by Samaras from our Collection. 

OUTSIDE: Fun, Food, Fantasy
Reflect on your selfie under MirrorMirror, the streetfest tent designed by UB Architects Davidson and Rafialidis, then get in line for a Ferris wheel view of Nancy Rubins’s famous canoes. Visit the Big Top and feast on the wildly imaginative cuisine created especially by Rich’s Catering & Special Events. Dance and be amazed at the pop-up performances! 

Related Links:
- <a href="http://www.museumtix.com/program/program.aspx?vid=851&pid=1783305">Purchase tickets online</a>
- <a href="http://www.albrightknox.org/programs-and-events/event:06-20-2014-7-00pm-mirror-mirror/">Event link</a>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Club Casbah at Buffalo River Fest Park - August 23rd, 2014</title>
		<link>http://pyromancy.org/2014/07/club-casbah-at-buffalo-river-fest-park-august-23rd-2014/</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 14 Jul 2014 17:54:26 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[gbtunney]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://http://localhost/PYROMANCY2016/wordpress/?p=1732</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<a href="http://localhost/PYROMANCY2016/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2014/07/Casbah-Buffalo-NY-1.jpg"><img src="http://localhost/PYROMANCY2016/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2014/07/Casbah-Buffalo-NY-1-585x343.jpg" alt="Casbah-Buffalo-NY-1" width="585" height="343" class="alignnone size-Medium585 wp-image-1733" /></a>

( <a href="http://buffalorising.com/">source: Buffalo Rising</a> ) In Buffalo, the artistic influences of fire spinning, Bollywood dance, belly dancing and the like are ever-present these days. But it’s not often that we get to experience them all together… at a waterfront setting… with a dramatic sunset.

Fortunately a new event is coming to the Buffalo River called “Club Casbah”. The event is scheduled to take place at River Fest Park in August, so mark your calendars and set aside the date. There will be opportunities to take mini-belly dance lessons, watch the experts do their stuff, mingle with international teachers artists and teachers, and witness the fire dancing prowess of Buffalo’s own Pyromancy.

The free evening culminates with a dance party… fire, water, dancing, sunset and music. What’s not to like about that?

Ride your bike, come by boat, or take the Metro Rail and walk over from the foot of Main Street.

“Club Casbah” @ River Fest Park (<a href="https://www.google.com/maps/place/249+Ohio+St/@42.870272,-78.870368,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m2!3m1!1s0x89d31225bbc2e5db:0x8e84e497f435519c">map</a>)| 249 Ohio St | Buffalo, New York | August 23, 2014 | 6:30-10pm

Photo credit: Toki Cavener

Related Links:
- <a href="http://buffalorising.com/2014/06/club-casbah-river-fest-park/">Club Casbah in Buffalo Rising</a>
- <a href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/clubcasbah.riverfest.park/">Facebook Group</a>
- <a href="https://www.facebook.com/events/794559097229188/">Facebook Event Page</a>]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Steampunk Festival at Leonard Oakes Estate Winery –  August 30th 2014</title>
		<link>http://pyromancy.org/2014/08/steampunk-festival-at-leonard-oakes-estate-winery-august-30th-2014/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 26 Aug 2014 19:08:47 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[gbtunney]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://http://localhost/PYROMANCY2016/wordpress/?p=1782</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<a href="http://localhost/PYROMANCY2016/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/steampunk_fest-FIXED-1040x500.png"><img src="http://localhost/PYROMANCY2016/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/steampunk_fest-FIXED-1040x500-585x290.png" alt="Steampunk Festival 2014" width="585" height="290" class="alignnone size-Medium585 wp-image-1793" /></a>
(<a href="http://oakeswinery.com/steampunk-festival/">source</a>)

<strong>Steampunk Festival 2014</strong> | Leonard Oakes Estate Winery 10609 Ridge Rd, Medina, New York 14103  (<a href="https://www.google.com/maps/place/Leonard+Oakes+Estate+Winery/@43.262717,-78.436788,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m2!3m1!1s0x89d4772215503ecf:0x45f136f2d437b9b3">map</a>) | Saturday, August 30th 2014@ 5:00 pm until 10:00 pm

Fire Show by Pyromancy
Live Sideshow Acts including Arlowe Price, Riley Schillaci & others
Fireworks
Music All Day
Food Trucks
Steampunk Vendors
Photo Booth by RG Lama Studios
Live Festival Projection by Projex
Two Private Cider Tasting Sessions
Steampunk Costume Contest

<div style="padding-left:10px;"><a href="http://localhost/PYROMANCY2016/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/SteampunkFlyer.png"><img src="http://localhost/PYROMANCY2016/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/SteampunkFlyer-585x338.png" alt="Steampunk Festival 2014" width="350"  class="alignnone size-Medium585 wp-image-1785" /></a></div>

Admission: General Admission (GA) $10
GA + Private Cider Tasting (limited) $25
GA + Steampunk Swag Fanny Pack $25
GA + Private Cider Tasting + Steampunk Swag Fanny Pack $35

Related Links:
- <a href="https://www.facebook.com/events/332572300252055/">Facebook Event</a>
- <a href="http://www.brownpapertickets.com/event/783537">Ticket Information</a>
- <a href="http://oakeswinery.com/ ">Leonard Oaks Estate Winery</a>

	<item>
		<title>Niagara Celtic Heritage Festival – September 13th 2014</title>
		<link>http://pyromancy.org/2014/09/niagara-celtic-heritage-festival-september-13th-2014/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 11 Sep 2014 21:47:47 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[gbtunney]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://http://localhost/PYROMANCY2016/wordpress/?p=1798</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<div align='center'><img class="size-Medium585 wp-image-1800 aligncenter" src="http://localhost/PYROMANCY2016/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2014/09/1544949_765633880131209_713786374_n-585x216.jpg" alt="1544949_765633880131209_713786374_n" width="585" height="216" /></div>

Fire Show by Pyromancy @ 9:00 PM

<strong>Niagara Celtic Heritage Festival</strong> | Krull Park 6108 Lake Rd, Olcott, New York 14126 | September 13th 2014

Join us for our 14th Annual Niagara Celtic Heritage Festival &amp; Highland Games!!

Admission Prices: Weekend $25 | Saturday $20 | Sunday $12

This year it's being held on September 13th &amp; 14th. History will come alive at Krull Park, inside the charming village of Olcott Beach. Guests of this yearly festival, just a one hour drive from both Buffalo and Rochester, will find themselves immersed in the traditions and pageantry of Ireland, Scotland, and Wales. Live Celtic music, dancers, sports, clans, living historians, vendors, food, contests and children's activities come together to make the festival a truly memorable day for all! Pre-Sale Tickets Available, Save $$ order early! Click to Order: http://bit.ly/niagaracelttix

<div align='center'>
<img class="size-full wp-image-1799 aligncenter" src="http://localhost/PYROMANCY2016/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2014/09/1236917_10151897027676031_1553572719_n.jpg" alt="1236917_10151897027676031_1553572719_n" width="200" height="200" /></div>

Related Links:

- <a href="https://www.facebook.com/events/692401084151773/">Facebook Event Link</a>

- <a href="http://www.niagaraceltic.com/">Niagara Celtic Website </a>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Music: Niagara Celtic Festival Soundtrack 2014</title>
		<link>http://pyromancy.org/2014/10/music-niagara-celtic-festival-soundtrack-2014/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 03 Oct 2014 03:56:54 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[gbtunney]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://http://localhost/PYROMANCY2016/wordpress/?p=1882</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<iframe src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%3A//api.soundcloud.com/tracks/167938576&amp;auto_play=false&amp;hide_related=false&amp;show_comments=true&amp;show_user=true&amp;show_reposts=false&amp;visual=true" width="100%" height="300" frameborder="no" scrolling="no"></iframe>

The soundtrack from Pyromancy's fire performance at <a href="http://www.niagaraceltic.com/">Niagara Celtic Festival 2014</a>. Mixed by <a href="//about/performers/gillian-tunney/">Gillian Tunney</a>. Dance / celtic / world music influences.

<span style="text-decoration: underline;"><strong>Tracklist</strong></span>
<ol>
	<li>Colossus : <strong>Afro Celt Sound System</strong> 0:00:00</li>
	<li>An Gwirder: <strong>Baka Beyond</strong> 3:40:00</li>
	<li>Wandering Spirit: <strong>Baka Beyond</strong> 7:27:00</li>
	<li>Nightstep: <strong>Delhi 2 Dublin</strong> 8:57:00</li>
	<li>Apples: <strong>Delhi 2 Dublin</strong> 12:12:00</li>
	<li>Lovers Of Light: <strong>Afro Celt Sound System</strong> 15:44:00</li>
	<li>Mecanix (Remix): <strong>Urban Trad</strong> 17:34:00</li>
	<li>Get Reel: <strong>Urban Trad</strong> 20:31:00</li>
</ol>]]></content:encoded>

	</item>
	<item>
		<title>Press: New Orleans Hub - Outrageous Feats, Costumes at Steampunk Fest </title>
		<link>http://pyromancy.org/2014/10/press-new-orleans-hub-outrageous-feats-costumes-at-steampunk-fest/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 07 Oct 2014 06:36:22 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[gbtunney]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://http://localhost/PYROMANCY2016/wordpress/?p=1899</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[&nbsp;
<div align="center"><a href="http://localhost/PYROMANCY2016/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2014/09/logo.png"><img class="size-full wp-image-1904 aligncenter" src="http://localhost/PYROMANCY2016/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2014/09/logo.png" alt="New Orleans Hub" width="550" height="116" /></a></div>
<div align="center">

( <a href="http://www.orleanshub.com/news2014/Outrageous-feats-costumes-at-Steampunk-Fest.htm">source</a> ) Photos by Tom Rivers
<a href="http://localhost/PYROMANCY2016/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2014/09/083114_SPfire1.jpg"><img class="size-full wp-image-1901 aligncenter" src="http://localhost/PYROMANCY2016/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2014/09/083114_SPfire1.jpg" alt="Photos by Tom Rivers , New Orleans Hub" width="500" height="350" /></a>

</div>
<p style="text-align: justify;">MEDINA – Pyromancy Fire Performance Troupe members Fuego and Potter Dee blow fire in one of the group’s daring pyrotechnic displays on Saturday at the Steampunk Festival at Leonard Oakes Estate Winery.Pyromancy of Buffalo performed before a big crowd. Nearly 1,000 people attended the fourth annual festival.</p>
<p style="text-align: justify;">“It continues to gain steam,” said Jerod Thurber, event coordinator for Leonard Oakes. “It’s a nice laid-back funky festival.”</p>

<div align="center"><a href="http://localhost/PYROMANCY2016/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2014/09/083114_SPfire4.jpg"><img class="size-full wp-image-1900 aligncenter" src="http://localhost/PYROMANCY2016/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2014/09/083114_SPfire4.jpg" alt="Photos by Tom Rivers , New Orleans Hub" width="500" height="310" /></a></div>
<strong>Read more at the <a href="http://www.orleanshub.com/news2014/Outrageous-feats-costumes-at-Steampunk-Fest.htm">New Orleans Hub</a>!</strong>]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>1899</wp:post_id>

	<item>
		<title>First Night Buffalo - December 31, 2014</title>
		<link>http://pyromancy.org/2014/12/first-night-buffalo-december-31-2014/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 19 Dec 2014 22:28:29 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[gbtunney]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://http://localhost/PYROMANCY2016/wordpress/?p=1946</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[&nbsp;

<a href="http://localhost/PYROMANCY2016/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2014/12/first-night-banner.png"><img class="alignnone size--post-size wp-image-1950" src="http://localhost/PYROMANCY2016/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2014/12/first-night-banner-600x172.png" alt="First Night Buffalo" width="600" height="172" /></a>
<div align="center">
<p>153 Franklin Street| Buffalo, NY 14202 (<a href="https://www.google.com/maps/place/153+Franklin+St,+Buffalo,+NY+14202/@42.88685,-78.875691,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m2!3m1!1s0x89d312491a603971:0x39fca6da961024d3">map</a>) | December 31st 2014 | Wednesday  5pm until 10pm</p>
<p>Schedule of shows, games and other activities available <a href="http://firstnightbuffalo.org/schedule.html">here</a>!</p>

<a href="http://localhost/PYROMANCY2016/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2014/12/first-night-content.png"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-1949" src="http://localhost/PYROMANCY2016/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2014/12/first-night-content.png" alt="First Night Buffalo" width="513" height="387" /></a></div>

Presented by <a href="https://www.independenthealth.com">Independant Health Foundation</a>, The annual holiday family tradition, now in its 26th year in Buffalo, offers family-friendly activities for all ages to ring in the New Year, including carnival rides and amusements, laser tag, costume characters, music and more.

The $8 event tickets, which go on sale Dec.2, are available at Wegmans and include all rides, attractions and activities. Children 2-years-old and under are free. Tickets are $10 at the door.

For more information and a schedule of events, visit the <a href="http://firstnightbuffalo.org">First Night Buffalo website</a>, visit us on Facebook, or call (716) 635-4959. Like us on <a href="https://www.facebook.com/events/582008218599362/">Facebook</a> and see frequent updates on this year's lineup.

[caption id="attachment_1947" align="alignnone" width="600"]<a href="http://localhost/PYROMANCY2016/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2014/12/pyromancy-first-night.png"><img class="size--post-size wp-image-1947" src="http://localhost/PYROMANCY2016/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2014/12/pyromancy-first-night-600x408.png" alt="Potter and Asha with the mayor Byron Brown!" width="600" height="408" /></a> <em>Potter and Asha with the mayor Byron Brown!</em>[/caption]

Related Links:
- <a href="https://www.facebook.com/events/582008218599362/">Facebook Event</a>
- <a href="http://firstnightbuffalo.org/tickets.html">Ticket Information</a>
- <a href="https://www.independenthealth.com">Independant Health Foundation</a>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Announcement: Beltane Bash Fundraiser</title>
		<link>http://pyromancy.org/2015/03/announcement-beltane-bash-fundraiser/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 10 Mar 2015 00:03:03 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[gbtunney]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://http://localhost/PYROMANCY2016/wordpress/?p=2026</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<div align="center"><a href="http://localhost/PYROMANCY2016/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2015/03/celtic.png"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-2028 aligncenter" src="http://localhost/PYROMANCY2016/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2015/03/celtic.png" alt="celtic" width="450" height="322" /></a></div>
<div style="text-align: center;"><em>Note: Pyromancy is not performing at this event,</br> but please support our friends to raise money for the 2015 festival.</em></div>
<div style="text-align: left; padding-left: 45px;" >
<div style="font-size: 170%;"><strong>
</strong><em>You are invited to a <strong>Beltane Bash Fundraiser!</strong></em></div>
To benefit the 15th Anniversary
<div style="font-size: 130%; text-align: left;"><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><strong>Niagara Celtic Heritage Festival &amp; Highland Games</strong></span></div>
<p style="text-align: left;">Saturday, April 25th, 2015 2:00 – 7:00pm
-Live Music provided by Penny Whiskey
Appetizers, Buffet,Coffee, Tea, Cookies, Cash Bar
$40 per person or $75 per couple Pre-Sale Tickets Only
Visit <a href="http://www.niagaraceltic.com">www.niagaraceltic.com</a> or call 716-622-1832
Brookside Banquet Center
2990 Lockport-Olcott Road, Newfane, NY (<a href="https://www.google.com/maps/place/2990+Lockport+Olcott+Rd,+Newfane,+NY+14108/@43.269989,-78.700457,17z/data=!4m7!1m4!3m3!1s0x89d480ff96ae3f87:0xe33740876ed1cdc2!2s2990+Lockport+Olcott+Rd,+Newfane,+NY+14108">map</a>)</p>

</div>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Trimania - April 18th 2015</title>
		<link>http://pyromancy.org/2015/04/trimania-april-18th-2015/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 17 Apr 2015 19:43:42 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[gbtunney]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://http://localhost/PYROMANCY2016/wordpress/?p=2042</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<a href="http://localhost/PYROMANCY2016/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/cropped-trimania-header.jpg"><img src="http://localhost/PYROMANCY2016/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/cropped-trimania-header-600x195.jpg" alt="cropped-trimania-header" width="600" height="195" class="alignnone size--post-size wp-image-2043" /></a>

<strong>Trimania 2015</strong> | Tri-Main Center 2495 Main Street Buffalo, NY 14214 (<a href="https://www.google.com/maps/place/2495+Main+St,+Buffalo,+NY+14214">map</a>) | April 18th, 2015 

Pyromancy with <a href="http://buffalocircusguild.org/">Buffalo Circus Guild</a> (<a href="http://www.acro-wny.org/">Acroyoga Buffalo</a>, Pyromancy, and <a href="http://www.aerialdancebuffalo.com/">Buffalo Aerial Dance</a>) shows at 7:30pm-8:00pm (VIP area) and 10:30pm-11:30pm (Central Lobby)

On Saturday, April 18, 2015, the <a href="http://buffaloartsstudio.org">Buffalo Arts Studio</a> (BAS) will welcome 3,000 guests to <a href="http://trimania.com/">TRIMANIA</a>, an epic celebration of art, culture, and music at the <a href="http://trimaincenter.com/">Tri-Main Center</a> located on Main Street in Buffalo. Every few years, for one night and one night only, BAS transforms six floors of the Tri-Main Center, a former manufacturing facility, with live bands, DJs, dancers, performers, comedians, poets, and visual artists, and provides the community with an opportunity to discover the vast Tri-Main Center. Visitors can explore artist’s studios at BAS as well as other businesses that call Tri-Main home, while they take in the crowds, performers, and installations throughout the building. TRIMANIA is one of the premier cultural events in Western New York and a highlight of Buffalo’s cultural and economic renaissance. You won’t want to miss TRIMANIA.

<a href="http://localhost/PYROMANCY2016/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/11141763_1007146195992051_6298296476070861885_o.jpg"><img src="http://localhost/PYROMANCY2016/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/11141763_1007146195992051_6298296476070861885_o-600x321.jpg" alt="11141763_1007146195992051_6298296476070861885_o" width="600" height="321" class="alignnone size--post-size wp-image-2044" /></a>

Related Links:

-<a href="https://www.facebook.com/events/860992403946286">Facebook Event</a>

-<a href="http://trimania.com/">Trimania</a>

-<a href="http://buffaloartsstudio.org">Buffalo Arts Studio</a>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Steampunk Festival at Leonard Oakes Estate Winery – August 29th 2015</title>
		<link>http://pyromancy.org/2015/08/steampunk-festival-at-leonard-oakes-estate-winery-august-29th-2015/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 19 Aug 2015 18:26:24 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[gbtunney]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://localhost/PYROMANCY2016/wordpress/?p=2058</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<a href="http://localhost/PYROMANCY2016/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/11717585_10152884955985723_4001586044644373294_o.jpg"><img src="http://localhost/PYROMANCY2016/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/11717585_10152884955985723_4001586044644373294_o-600x267.jpg" alt="11717585_10152884955985723_4001586044644373294_o" width="600" height="267" class="alignnone size--post-size wp-image-2059" /></a>

<strong>Steampunk Festival 2015</strong> | Leonard Oakes Estate Winery 10609 Ridge Rd, Medina, New York 14103  (<a href="https://www.google.com/maps/place/Leonard+Oakes+Estate+Winery/@43.262717,-78.436788,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m2!3m1!1s0x89d4772215503ecf:0x45f136f2d437b9b3">map</a>) | Saturday, August 29th 2015@ 5:00 pm until 10:00 pm

A Festival of BIZARRE Proportions
5th Annual: August 29th, 2015

Performance by Pyromancy
<a href="https://pinefever.bandcamp.com/track/full-moon-rag">Pine Fever</a>
Live Musical Acts (TBA!)
Local Food Trucks
Creators, Inventors & Purveyors of Fine Wares

Pyromancy will be putting together one of their biggest productions for Steampunk 2015 this year. This will include curated live musical compositions, more fire, bigger fire, hotter fire......and they make sure that you are close enough to feel it all!

General Admission: $10 presale, $13 day of event

Related Links:
- <a href="https://www.facebook.com/events/1469172353397165/">Facebook Event</a>
- <a href="https://www.secureclubva.net/OakesWinery/asp/sh1.aspx?guest=true&WcrShopID=WC0000006">Ticket Information</a>
- <a href="http://oakeswinery.com/ ">Leonard Oaks Estate Winery</a> 

]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Fire Spinning Safety Workshop – May 14th 2016</title>
		<link>http://pyromancy.org/2016/05/fire-spinning-safety-workshop-may-14th-2016/</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 02 May 2016 17:53:50 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[gbtunney]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://localhost/PYROMANCY2016/wordpress/?p=2100</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Fire Spinning Safety Workshop presented by Pyromancy | Lasalle Park Amphitheater Amvets Dr Buffalo NY 14201 (<a href="https://www.google.com/maps/search/42.889722,-78.893914+5+Porter+Ave+Buffalo+NY+14201-1015+United+States/@42.889722,-78.893914,261m/data=!3m1!1e3">map</a>) | Saturday, May 14th 2016 @ 7:00 pm - 10:00 pm
<div align="center">
<div style="text-align: center; width: 500px; margin: 5px; padding:15px;background-color: #321b0e;    border: 1px solid #beb99d;" >
Workshop Payments Now Closed. Thank you to everyone who participated!
</div></div>
<strong>Tickets</strong>: $40 Single Pass (day of workshop)
<a href="https://www.facebook.com/events/1716933761925484/" target="_blank">Facebook Event</a> 

This comprehensive 2 hr workshop will cover everything you need to know about safely dancing and spinning with fire. The workshop will start with a lecture followed by a Q&A session. Then we will follow with hands on practice putting out both props and people. Afterwards we will have time to play and have a wide variety of props to demo and try.

Workshop session will be capped at 20 to maintain personalized atmosphere. Reserve your spot in advance with discounted presale tickets above. Class fee is $40 payable in cash on arrival at the event. All people are welcome, especially those who have never used fire before!  If you are new or a solo fire spinner, consider bringing a friend who would like to learn to be your safety. Discounted presale tickets are available for pairs above. This is a rain or shine activity as the amphitheater provides adequate protection. Please bring warm clothing and something to sit on. All participants must be sober. 

Class materials will include a variety of handouts like safety guidelines and check lists, MSDS sheets for common fuels, contacts and online resources.

<u><strong>We will be covering:</strong></u>
- Mandatory safety equipment and proper protocol
- Protecting yourself
- Fuel selection
- What is a Fire Safety Person and why you need one every single time you play with fire
- How to set up a safe fire spinning area and fuel dump
- How to extinguish a prop, person or fuel dump fire
- Communication between safeties, spinners and audience.
- LOCAL fire law regulations and event permits
- Communicating effectively with authorities
- Discussion of recent negative events in the news, changing legal situations, and the future of fire arts

We really can't stress enough, proper safety is needed if we want to keep fire spinning legal. Two recent accidents in Florida, coupled with increased legislation in cities like NYC, SF, Seattle, and elsewhere, have put fire spinning in the legal cross-hairs. We have a great situation here in Buffalo and really want to keep it that way! Come learn how to be responsible and safe for yourself and others!

<u><strong>About Us:</strong></u>
Workshop will be led by <a href="http://localhost/PYROMANCY2016/wordpress/about/performers/doktor-potter-dee/">Potter Dee</a> and <a href="http://localhost/PYROMANCY2016/wordpress/about/performers/fuego/">Fuego Barr</a> of Pyromancy Fire Performance Troupe. They are constantly updating their knowledge and skill set by attending yearly safety training workshops at <a href="https://www.wildfireretreat.com/" target="_blank">Wildfire Fire Retreat</a>. As resident fire safety coordinators at <a href="http://brushwood.com/" target="_blank">Brushwood Folklore Center</a>, they have shared their passion for responsible fire dancing and building community since 2012. 

<a href="http://localhost/PYROMANCY2016/wordpress/" target="_blank">Pyromancy Fire Performance Troupe</a> specializes in promoting the art of Fire Dancing, Object Manipulation, Circus and Flow Arts. Founded in 2010, they have performed at over 200 public and private events in the Western New York area. The troupe is made up of skilled and dedicated performers from a variety of backgrounds who are passionate about sharing their love of fire spinning and dancing!



]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Gowanda Hollywood Happening– June 4th &amp; 5th 2016</title>
		<link>http://pyromancy.org/2016/06/hollywood-happening-august-29th-2015/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 01 Jun 2016 17:15:53 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[gbtunney]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://pyromancy.org/?p=2127</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<div align="center"><a href="http://pyromancy.org/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/gowanda.png"><img src="http://pyromancy.org/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/gowanda.png" alt="gowanda" width="450" height="436" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-2128" /></a></div>

June 4 & 5 1:00pm, 2:30pm, and 4:00pm | Hollywood Happening | 39 W Main St. Gowanda, NY 14070 (<a href="https://www.google.com/maps/place/39+W+Main+St,+Gowanda,+NY+14070/@42.4633579,-78.938652,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x89d2e8c9c6645417:0xf6f985eb01472ca9!8m2!3d42.463354!4d-78.936458">map</a>)

<strong><u>Buffalo Aerial Dance w/ Pyromancy- Aerial and LED Dancing Shows</u></strong>

To kick off the summer, we’ll be heading out to Gowanda to help celebrate the restoration of the beautiful <a href="http://www.gowandahollywoodtheater.com">Hollywood Theater</a>, a cousin to North Tonawanda’s Rivera Theater. On Saturday and Sunday, we’ll be doing multiple LED shows as guest artists in the theater, along with featured <a href="http://www.aerialdancebuffalo.com">Buffalo Aerial Dance</a> on portable riggings. This is the <a href="http://www.gowandahollywoodhappening.com/">18th annual Hollywood Happening</a>, and there are many other attractions in addition to our shows.  Check out the details <a href="http://www.gowandahollywoodhappening.com/">here</a>.]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>2127</wp:post_id>

		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[open]]></wp:ping_status>

		<wp:status><![CDATA[publish]]></wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>

	<item>
		<title>13th Annual Brant Summerfest - June 17th 2016</title>
		<link>http://pyromancy.org/2016/06/13th-annual-brant-summerfest-june-17th-2016/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 15 Jun 2016 16:17:23 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[gbtunney]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://pyromancy.org/?p=2131</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<em><a href="http://pyromancy.org/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/13226973_284790131858318_6721816813184408334_n.jpg"><img src="http://pyromancy.org/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/13226973_284790131858318_6721816813184408334_n-600x825.jpg" alt="13226973_284790131858318_6721816813184408334_n" width="600" height="825" class="alignnone size--post-size wp-image-2132" /></a>

June 17th 9:00pm |  13th Annual Brant Summerfest | 1000 Brant Farnham Rd Brant, NY 14027 (<a href="https://www.google.com/maps/place/1000+Brant+Farnham+Rd,+Irving,+NY+14081/@42.5911479,-79.046214,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x89d2de4027e1c92f:0xdd06d1754c9d055a!8m2!3d42.591144!4d-79.04402">map</a>)

Vendors, food, and music including <a href="http://www.aerialdancebuffalo.com">Buffalo Aerial Dance</a> on Saturday. There are bounce houses and kiddie rides, a Father's Day Parade on Sunday, donkey races, strawberry pie eating contest, Goya cook-off, photo contest, 50/50 raffle, basket raffle, Fireman's waterball contest, and much more!

** Pyromancy Show is June 17th 2016 at 9pm ** 
Fri 4pm, Sat & Sun 12pm
Admission: Free

]]></content:encoded>

		<title>Video: Summer Splash 2016</title>
		<link>http://pyromancy.org/2016/09/video-summer-splash-2016/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 20 Sep 2016 22:03:12 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[gbtunney]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://pyromancy.org/?p=2137</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[8.6.2016 <a href="http://summersplashbuffalo.com/">Summer Splash 2016 </a> presented by Carly's Club at <a href="https://www.roswellpark.org/">Roswell Park</a>
<div align="center"><a href="http://pyromancy.org/wp-content/uploads/2016/09/summer-splash.png"><img src="http://pyromancy.org/wp-content/uploads/2016/09/summer-splash.png" alt="summer-splash" width="469" height="256" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-2138" /></a></div>

<em>Thank you for joining us at the 5th annual Summer Splash, presented by Upstate Pharmacy Ltd., to support pediatric cancer research and patient support programs through Carly’s Club at Roswell Park Cancer Institute.</em>

<u>Video Recap: (courtesy of <a href="http://summersplashbuffalo.com/">Summer Splash 2016</a>)</u>
<div align="center">[youtube]ItaTfNaVbiM[/youtube]</div>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Ithaca Wizarding Weekend - October 29th 2016</title>
		<link>http://pyromancy.org/2016/10/ithaca-wizarding-weekend-october-29th-2016/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 27 Oct 2016 21:59:16 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[gbtunney]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://pyromancy.org/?p=2149</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<div align="center"><a href="http://pyromancy.org/wp-content/uploads/2016/10/ithaca-wizarding-weekend.png"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-2150" src="http://pyromancy.org/wp-content/uploads/2016/10/ithaca-wizarding-weekend.png" alt="ithaca-wizarding-weekend" width="381" height="261" /></a></div>
<p style="text-align: center;"><em>Press Bay Alley and Ehrhart Energy Present:</em>
<a href="http://wizardingweekend.com/"><strong>Ithaca's Wizarding Weekend 2016</strong></a></p>
<p style="text-align: left;">Journey to Ithaca NY for a magical weekend inspired by the Harry Potter book series! Part street festival, part fantasycon, Wizarding Weekend takes over downtown Ithaca in a family-friendly way!</p>
The Wizarding Street Festival Day is Saturday October 29th only. <a href="http://wizardingweekend.com/masterschedule/">Full Schedule</a>, Tickets, Reservations &amp; Participants Listing available at <a href="http://wizardingweekend.com/">Wizardingweekend.com</a>

<a href="http://pyromancy.org/wp-content/uploads/2016/10/wiarddate.png"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-2151" src="http://pyromancy.org/wp-content/uploads/2016/10/wiarddate.png" alt="wiarddate" width="341" height="159" /></a>

We will be holding four daytime street shows: 10 am, 11:30am, 1:30pm, 4pm, including a dance revue, wizard duel, wandering characters, and a hooping workshop!

<b><u>Cayuga Street Street Performances:</u></b>
10:00am &amp; 1:00pm – Azkaban Breakout – become an auror and help track down dark wizards
10:30am, 12:30pm, 2:30pm – Circus Culture
11:00am, 4:30pm – The Comedy Flops
11:30am, 1:30pm, 4:00pm – Pyromancy
12:00pm – Hilby the Skinny German Juggle Boy
1:30pm-4:30pm – Cornell Raptor Presentation
2:00pm – Wizarding Kids Acting Performance

Throughout the day Pyromancy will be vending a variety of hand made jewellery, horns, journals, hair ribbons, and <a href="https://www.facebook.com/Hennabyfuego/?fref=ts">henna</a>. Come find us at our booth R24 on the map.

<a href="http://pyromancy.org/wp-content/uploads/2016/10/ithaca-wizarding-weekend-map.png"><img class="alignnone size--post-size wp-image-2152" src="http://pyromancy.org/wp-content/uploads/2016/10/ithaca-wizarding-weekend-map-600x389.png" alt="ithaca-wizarding-weekend-map" width="600" height="389" /></a>

Come evening, we will be dancing with LEDs at both sessions of The Tri-Wizard Ball, get your tickets <a href="https://breathe.fashion/products/tri-wizardballtickets?variant=29361668364">now</a>!

<strong><u>TriWizard Ball </u></strong>
Saturday October 29 TWO DIFFERENT SESSIONS: 6:30-8:30pm (ideal for families) OR 10pm-midnight at the Community School of Music and Arts Third Floor Ballroom (330 E. State Street, Ithaca NY 14850 - <a href="https://www.google.com/maps/place/330+E+State+St,+Ithaca,+NY+14850/@42.4397793,-76.4966888,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x89d0819b1af7c367:0x1ed3f17faf7f45c3!8m2!3d42.4397754!4d-76.4944948">map</a>). $25 per person.
Dance to music provided by DJ Gunns, get your official wizarding portrait taken, enter the contest for Best Costume, meet some of your favorite costumed characters and enjoy complimentary treats from some of Ithaca’s finest purveyors. Our most famous local ghost, the notorious Edward Rulloff himself, will be hosting a cash bar. Each guest will receive one entry into the raffle for some spectacular prizes. Additional raffle tickets will be available for sale. All proceeds go to support Wizarding Weekend, a 501c not-for-profit endeavor. <a href="https://breathe.fashion/products/tri-wizardballtickets?variant=29361668364">Purchase tickets here. </a>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Welcome to Pyromancy Shop!</title>
		<link>http://pyromancy.org/2017/03/2210/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 07 Mar 2017 21:27:25 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[gbtunney]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://pyromancy.org/?p=2210</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<a href="http://pyromancyshop.com"><img class="alignnone size--post-size wp-image-2216" src="http://pyromancy.org/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/welcome-banner-600x137.jpg" alt="" width="600" height="137" /></a>

We are excited to announce that the <a href="http://pyromancyshop.com">Pyromancy Shop</a> is now live! Featuring Pyromancy Fire Performance Troupe branded merchandise as well as original designs by <a href="http://pyromancy.org/about/performers/gillian-tunney/">Gillian Tunney</a>, for sublimation print leggings and shirts, tanks, bandanas, and more. These movement friendly clothes are inspired by the flow and fire arts. All clothes are made in US and Canada from American materials and have been chosen for superior fit and durability. I have placed much thought and passion into these designs and I hope you will all like them as much as I do! <a href="http://pyromancyshop.com">Please support my work by making a purchase!</a> - Gillian Tunney

<a href="http://pyromancy.org/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/collage.png"><img class="alignnone size--post-size wp-image-2208" src="http://pyromancy.org/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/collage-600x475.png" alt="" width="600" height="475" /></a>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Summer Solstice Celebration at Artpark- June 17th, 2017</title>
		<link>http://pyromancy.org/2017/06/summer-solstice-celebration-artpark-june-17th-2017/</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 05 Jun 2017 15:54:27 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[gbtunney]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://pyromancy.org/?p=2233</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Saturday, June 17th, 2017 | 12:00pm - 12:00am
<a href="http://www.artpark.net/events/fairy-house-festival-summer-solstice">Summer Solstice Celebration</a>
with the 7th annual Fairy House Festival featuring <a href="http://www.lehrerdance.org/">Lehrer Dance</a>
<a href="http://www.artpark.net/events/fairy-house-festival-summer-solstice"><img class="alignnone size--post-size wp-image-2234" style="padding-top: 15px; padding-bottom: 15px;" src="http://pyromancy.org/wp-content/uploads/2017/06/sb_fhf2017-600x247.jpeg" alt="" width="600" height="247" /></a>
From noon to midnight, <a href="http://www.artpark.net">Artpark</a> will transform its grounds into a Summer Solstice Festival! The Summer Solstice heralds the beginning of summer, and represents a time of fulfillment. From New Year's resolutions to the big goals in your life, the Solstice is a time to celebrate the achievements you've made, and acknowledgements for the future.
<div class="large-hrule "></div>
<a style="float: left; margin-right: 20px;" href="http://pyromancy.org/wp-content/uploads/2017/06/FHFweb_Moon.jpeg"><img class="alignnone size--post-size wp-image-2235" src="http://pyromancy.org/wp-content/uploads/2017/06/FHFweb_Moon.jpeg" alt="" width="250" height="350" /></a>
<u><strong>Summer Solstice Celebration After party &amp; Moon Dance</strong></u>
Immediately following the Lehrer Dance Mainstage Theater performance, an after party with a performances by Slyboots Circus and <strong>Pyromancy</strong> with libations on the Terrace.

<em>Photo by Pavel Antonov</em>

Related Links:
- <a href="http://www.artpark.net/events/fairy-house-festival-summer-solstice">Event</a>
- <a href="http://www.artpark.net/events/fairy-house-festival-summer-solstice">Facebook Event Page</a>
- <a href="http://www.artpark.net">Art Park</a>
- <a href="http://www.lehrerdance.org/">Lehrer Dance </a>
- <a href="http://aerialdancebuffalo.com">Buffalo Aerial Dance</a>
<div style="clear: both;"></div>]]></content:encoded>

	</item>
	<item>
		<title>Transformations at NACC Grand Theatre - October 7th, 2017</title>
		<link>http://pyromancy.org/2017/10/transformations-nacc-grand-theatre-october-7th-2017/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 05 Oct 2017 20:59:34 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[gbtunney]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://pyromancy.org/?p=2308</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<a href="http://pyromancy.org/wp-content/uploads/2017/10/21743628_2075353749157245_6603363814010978038_o.png"><img class="size--post-size wp-image-2313" style="padding-bottom: 15px;" src="http://pyromancy.org/wp-content/uploads/2017/10/21743628_2075353749157245_6603363814010978038_o-600x194.png" alt="" width="600" height="194" /></a>

<a style="float: left; padding: 0 15px 0px 0;" href="http://pyromancy.org/wp-content/uploads/2017/10/19511082_1968083699884251_4050760847692255052_n.jpg"><img class="alignnone size-thumbnail-sm wp-image-2309" src="http://pyromancy.org/wp-content/uploads/2017/10/19511082_1968083699884251_4050760847692255052_n-135x135.jpg" alt="" width="135" height="135" /></a>
<div style="padding-right: 36px; padding-bottom: 20px; padding-top: 20px; text-align: right; line-height: 30px;">
<div>Saturday, October 7th, 2017 | 7:30pm - 8:30pm</div>
<div style="font-size: 18px!important; font-style: italic; text-transform: uppercase!important;"><em>Transformations Wearable Art Show &amp;</em></div>
<div style="font-size: 16px!important; font-style: italic; text-transform: uppercase!important;"><em>Juried Competition</em></div>
</div>
<ul style="clear: both; padding-top: 20px; padding-left: 20px;">
 	<li><b>Scene 1—Fit for a Queen—</b>Victorian and early 20th century fashions, industrial revolution, Steampunk.</li>
 	<li><b>Scene 2—Glamour Girls: </b> The golden years of Hollywood, the birth of the “iconic movie star”</li>
 	<li><b>Scene 3—Wild Child:  </b>A time of peace, love, rock ’n roll and fashion…the 1960’s and 1970’s.</li>
 	<li><b>Scene 4—Let’s Dance!   </b>Fabulous fashions from the Discos Days, to the big hair and bangles of the 80’s to the hip-hop fashions of the 90’s.</li>
 	<li><b>Scene 5—Millennium Chaos:  </b>This is the “anything goes” category.</li>
 	<li><b>Scene 6—Futuristic Diva:  </b> Envision the fashions of the future.</li>
</ul>
<span style="font-weight: 500; text-transform: uppercase;">Event Location </span>(<a href="https://www.google.com/maps/place/Niagara+Arts+%26+Cultural+Center/@43.094026,-79.047403,14z/data=!4m5!3m4!1s0x0:0xf2095baba0badee4!8m2!3d43.0938591!4d-79.0472117?hl=en">map</a>):
<div style="padding-left: 20px;">Niagara Arts and Cultural Center Grand Theatre (2nd Fl)
1201 Pine Avenue
Niagara Falls, NY 14301
Tel: (716) 282-7530</div>
<strong style="font-weight: 500; text-transform: uppercase;">Admission Fees:</strong>
<ul style="padding-left: 20px;">
 	<li>$20.00 General Admission&gt;</li>
 	<li>$15.00 NACC Member / Student Admission</li>
</ul>
<strong style="font-weight: 500; text-transform: uppercase;">Links for more information:</strong>
<ul style="padding-left: 20px; padding-bottom: 10px;">
 	<li><a href="http://thenacc.org/transformations/">Niagara Arts and Cultural Center</a></li>
 	<li><a href="https://www.facebook.com/transformationwearableart17/">Transformations Facebook</a></li>
</ul>
